TopicTitle: T minus display is gone, is there a toggle?

Articles.Content: So now when I go to the map view, I no longer see a display letting me know the "t minus" to my apoapsis. Any ideas on how to get this back?
Move your mouse over it, right. Click to make it stay.

Is this happening in a new career game? You don't get "t minus" until you've upgraded your Tracking Station to tier 2.

Edited January 9, 2017 by bewing
